TopicTitle: Old parts not getting replaced when updating to 1.0

Articles.Content:
Looking at my parts list, and I notice that the old model for the standard one-wheel airplane landing gear isn't being replaced by the new one from this image: 

![mkrGKNT.jpg](http://i.imgur.com/mkrGKNT.jpg)

What I'm seeing in the VAB:

![68ECFF40E069B2C955B5D67D901ADB6513955926](http://images.akamai.steamusercontent.com/ugc/532891784919450872/68ECFF40E069B2C955B5D67D901ADB6513955926/)

I'm also noticing that some other parts aren't being replaced or deleted even though some new parts appear to be their direct replacements, such as the old AV-R8 Winglet performing an apparently identical role as both the "standard canard" and "tail fin."

I've tried deleting and re-acquiring the Squad folder within GameData but these old parts just aren't going poof. Haven't tried a full reinstall, however - should I? ![:huh:](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_undecided.gif)

Thanks for any help.
The new small bay wasn't finished, the old small bay is staying in for the time being, so this is "normal" ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif)

> 
> The new small bay wasn't finished, the old small bay is staying in for the time being, so this is "normal" ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif)

Ah, okay, good to know. Thanks!
